JobFullDesc: Secure Sensor Solutions (S3) is looking for a driven individual to be a member of the Strategy and Business Development team! This role is responsible for supporting and leading activities associated with new business captures in the Secure Sensor Solutions (S3) business area and lead Resilient Navigation business pursuits in the foreign and domestic markets. The effective candidate will support all business elements of captures; opportunity investigation, identification, and validation, competitive intelligence, price to win, licensing for export/import, offset development for foreign military sales (FMS), management of new business investment funds, create presentation material, attend customer and business partner meetings, and support pursuit of new business opportunities. A well-prepared candidate will be able to conduct international business and have extensive knowledge of the domestic market with established relationships. The ideal candidate will be an dedicated self-starter capable of working effectively on travel and able to manage a team remotely. In this position, the candidate will have the opportunity to participate in product line meetings and meetings with senior leadership. This role will collaborate across functional teammates and contribute material for business update briefings. This role will interact at the Director and Senior Director levels of the S3 organization. Influential and effective written and verbal communication will be required.
